Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class EqualityInclusiveMaxExtractor

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.MaxExtractor
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.EqualityInclusiveMaxExtractor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Function<Map<Player,Integer>,Optional<Player>>
public class EqualityInclusiveMaxExtractor extends MaxExtractor
Represents a function that tries to extract the Player associated with the maximum value in the given Map. If said Player can be found, an Optional containing it is returned, otherwise an empty Optional is returned. For more details on the edge cases, see the detailed documentation of the apply method.

    • isPrivilegedAMaxCandidate

      private boolean isPrivilegedAMaxCandidate(Map<Player,Integer> map, Map.Entry<Player,Integer> maxCandidate)
      Returns true if the privileged player is between the maximum candidates.
      Parameters:
      map - the Map to analyze
      maxCandidate - one of the maximum candidates
      Returns:
      true if the privileged player is between the maximum candidates
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameters are null

    • apply

      public Optional<Player> apply(Map<Player,Integer> map)
      Tries to determine the Player corresponding to the maximum value in Map. If it can be determined, it is returned inside an Optional, else an empty Optional is returned. The criteria followed is the following: 1. If only one candidate is found, that is returned; 2. If multiple candidates are found and privileged is between them, privileged is returned; 3. If multiple candidates are found and privileged is NOT between them, an empty optional is returned. 4. If the given map is empty, an empty optional is returned.
      Specified by:
      apply in interface Function<Map<Player,Integer>,Optional<Player>>
      Specified by:
      apply in class MaxExtractor
      Parameters:
      map - the Map to be analyzed
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the maximum, if it can be determined
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if map is null
